[𦣞]
Pictogram ( 象形 ). Possibly depicts the chin, in which case it is the original form of 頤 .

[頤]
May have originally been written 𦣞 , a pictogram ( 象形 ) of a chin, in which case the modern form is an ideogrammic compound ( 會意 / 会意 ) and phono-semantic compound ( 形聲 / 形声 , OC *lɯ ): phonetic 𦣞 ( yí , “ chin ” ) + semantic 頁 ( “ head ” ) .

[頉]
variant form of 頤
